trans-unit.source: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in SOAP format.
trans-unit.target: Serializa e desserializa um objeto ou um gráfico inteiro de objetos conectados, no formato SOAP.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Beginning with the .NET Framework 2.0, this class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Começando com o .NET Framework 2.0, essa classe está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> instead.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>em vez disso.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The SoapFormatter and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> classes implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> interface (inherited by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>) to support serialization of a graph of objects.
trans-unit.target: O SoapFormatter e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>classes implementam o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>interface para oferecer suporte a chamadas de procedimento remoto (RPCs) e o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>interface (herdada pelo <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>) para dar suporte a serialização de um gráfico de objetos.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The SoapFormatter class also supports RPCs with <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> objects, without using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> functionality.
trans-unit.target: A classe SoapFormatter também oferece suporte a RPCs com <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>objetos, sem usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>funcionalidade.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>

trans-unit.source: During RPCs, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
trans-unit.target: Durante a RPCs, o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>interface permite a especificação de dois gráficos de objetos separados: o gráfico de objetos para serializar e um gráfico adicional que contém uma matriz de objetos de cabeçalho que transmitem informações sobre a chamada de função remota (por exemplo, ID da transação ou uma assinatura de método).</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>

trans-unit.source: For proper serialization, the root object of the first graph must be an object that implements either the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface or the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para serialização apropriada, o objeto raiz do primeiro gráfico deve ser um objeto que implementa o o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>interface ou <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization of an RPC, a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler> delegate is specified to the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method of the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Durante a desserialização de um RPC, um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>delegado é especificado para o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize%2A>método do formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>

trans-unit.source: The remoting infrastructure uses the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler> delegate to produce an object that supports the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Usa a infra-estrutura de comunicação remota do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>delegado para produzir um objeto que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>

trans-unit.source: This object contains the information stored in the headers, and becomes the root of the graph returned by the deserializer.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto contém as informações armazenadas nos cabeçalhos e torna-se a raiz do gráfico retornado pelo desserializador.

trans-unit.source: The SoapFormatter can also handle RPCs that are produced with objects that implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: O SoapFormatter também pode lidar com RPCs que são produzidos com objetos que implementam o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>

trans-unit.source: To create an RPC without using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> functionality, place an object that supports the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> interface at the root of a graph being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma RPC sem usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>funcionalidade, o local de um objeto que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>interface na raiz de um gráfico que está sendo serializado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter>

trans-unit.source: To deserialize an RPC created in this manner the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A> property must be set to another object that supports the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> interface, and contains the relevant remote call information.
trans-unit.target: Para desserializar uma RPC criada dessa maneira a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>propriedade deve ser definida em outro objeto que ofereça suporte a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage>de interface e contém as informações relevantes chamada remota.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan Serialization TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de TimeSpan de serialização de TimeSpan são serializados de acordo com o padrão ISO 8601:1998 seção 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternativo".

trans-unit.source: Version Information The SoapFormatter does not support serialization compatibility between versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: SoapFormatter o de informações de versão não dá suporte a compatibilidade de serialização entre as versões do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Serialization between versions 1.1 and 2.0 types in the Framework often fails.
trans-unit.target: Falha na serialização entre os tipos de versões 1.1 e 2.0 do Framework geralmente.

trans-unit.source: The following actions can be taken to remedy this issue: - Convert to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>, which provides compatibility between 1.1 and 2.0.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes ações podem ser tomadas para solucionar este problema:-converter para usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>, que fornece compatibilidade entre 1.1 e 2.0.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: - Convert existing persisted data to the new format.
trans-unit.target: -Converta dados persistentes existentes para o novo formato.

trans-unit.source: - Convert all producers and consumers of serialized data to version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: -Converta todos os produtores e consumidores de dados serializados para a versão 2.0.

trans-unit.source: - Avoid using types that changed from 1.1 to 2.0.
trans-unit.target: -Evite usar tipos alterado de 1.1 para 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref> class with default property values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref> classe com valores de propriedade padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.SurrogateSelector%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context%2A>|A new <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> initialized to specify that the serialized data can be transmitted to or received from any of the other contexts|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.SurrogateSelector%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context%2A>| Um novo <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>inicializado para especificar que os dados serializados podem ser transmitidos para ou recebidos de qualquer um dos outros contextos de |</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.SurrogateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Objects are serialized to, or deserialized from, the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Objetos são serializados para ou desserializados a partir de <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> especificado

trans-unit.source: The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector> to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: O processo de serialização ou desserialização usa especificado <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>para procurar substitutos que são registrados para os tipos de objeto você deseja desserializar.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes.
trans-unit.target: Substitutos são auxiliares que serializar e desserializar objetos de classes específicas.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector> cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> for remoting purposes.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>não é possível lidar com a serialização de objetos que derivam de <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>para fins de comunicação remota.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: In a remoting situation the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector> replaces the object derived from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> with a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector.
trans-unit.target: Em uma situação de comunicação remota especificada <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>substitui o objeto derivado de <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>com um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>objeto é serializado pelo seletor substituto especificado.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> </xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, se você quiser usar objetos remotos, defina o `selector` parâmetro a uma instância de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector>

trans-unit.source: If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se você não precisar substitutos, defina o `selector` parâmetro seja `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> para usar com a nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that holds the source and destination of the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem e o destino da serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: If the `context` parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context*> defaults to <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o `context` parâmetro é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, em seguida, o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context*>padrão <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.Context*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the behavior of the deserializer with regards to finding and loading assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comportamento de desserialização em relação a encontrar e carregar assemblies.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle"></xref> values that specifies the deserializer behavior.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle"> </xref> valores que especifica o comportamento de desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> that controls the binding of a serialized object to a type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"> </xref> que controla a associação de um objeto serializado para um tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>usado com esta <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>fornece uma enumeração que descreve a origem e o destino para um determinado fluxo serializado, bem como uma forma de serialização manter esse contexto e um contexto adicional definido pelo chamador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>usado com esta <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the data on the provided stream and reconstitutes the graph of objects.
trans-unit.target: Desserializa os dados no fluxo fornecido e Reconstitui o gráfico de objetos.

trans-unit.source: For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.
trans-unit.target: Para desserialização bem-sucedida, a posição atual no fluxo deve ser no início do gráfico do objeto.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Chamar este método com dados não confiáveis é um risco de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método apenas com dados confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [riscos de segurança de dados não confiável](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que contém os dados a ser desserializado.

trans-unit.source: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).
trans-unit.target: O objeto superior do gráfico desserializado (raiz).

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the stream into an object graph with any headers in that stream being handled by the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desserializa o fluxo em um gráfico de objeto com quaisquer cabeçalhos no fluxo está sendo tratado pela determinado <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Headers are used only for specific remoting applications.
trans-unit.target: Cabeçalhos são usados apenas para aplicativos remotos específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler> parameter is one of two ways to return headers from a stream in SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>parâmetro é uma das duas maneiras de cabeçalhos de retorno de um fluxo no formato SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC).</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler>

trans-unit.source: The other way is to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A outra maneira é usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter.TopObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.
trans-unit.target: Para desserialização bem-sucedida, a posição atual no fluxo deve ser no início do gráfico do objeto.

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan Serialization TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de TimeSpan de serialização de TimeSpan são serializados de acordo com o padrão ISO 8601:1998 seção 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternativo".

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Chamar este método com dados não confiáveis é um risco de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método apenas com dados confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [riscos de segurança de dados não confiável](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que contém os dados a ser desserializado.

trans-unit.source: Delegate to handle any headers found on the stream.
trans-unit.target: Delegar para lidar com quaisquer cabeçalhos encontrados no fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).
trans-unit.target: O objeto superior do gráfico desserializado (raiz).

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: serializationStream supports seeking, and its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamoferece suporte à busca e seu tamanho é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref> of automatic deserialization for .NET Framework remoting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"> </xref> de desserialização automática para comunicação remota do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Supported values are <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel> (the default).
trans-unit.target: Valores com suporte são <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel>e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel>(o padrão).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel>

trans-unit.source: For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre os níveis de desserialização, consulte [desserialização automática no .NET Remoting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref> that represents the current automatic deserialization level.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"> </xref> que representa o nível atual de desserialização automática.

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object or graph of objects with the specified root to the given <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Serializa um objeto ou um gráfico de objetos com a raiz especificada para determinada <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de TimeSpan são serializados de acordo com o padrão ISO 8601:1998 seção 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternativo".

trans-unit.source: The stream onto which the formatter puts the data to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo no qual o formatador coloca os dados a serializar.

trans-unit.source: The object, or root of the object graph, to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O objeto, ou a raiz do gráfico do objeto para serializar.

trans-unit.source: All child objects of this root object are automatically serialized.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos filho desse objeto raiz automaticamente são serializados.

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object or graph of objects with the specified root to the given <xref:System.IO.Stream> in the SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) format.
trans-unit.target: Serializa um objeto ou um gráfico de objetos com a raiz especificado para o determinado <xref:System.IO.Stream>no formato SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC).</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Headers are used only for specific remoting applications.
trans-unit.target: Cabeçalhos são usados apenas para aplicativos remotos específico.

trans-unit.source: TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de TimeSpan são serializados de acordo com o padrão ISO 8601:1998 seção 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternativo".

trans-unit.source: The stream onto which the formatter puts the data to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo no qual o formatador coloca os dados a serializar.

trans-unit.source: The object or root of the object graph to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ou a raiz do gráfico de objeto para serializar.

trans-unit.source: All child objects of this root object are automatically serialized.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos filho desse objeto raiz automaticamente são serializados.

trans-unit.source: Remoting headers to include in the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Cabeçalhos de comunicação remota para incluir na serialização.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: serializationStream is .
trans-unit.target: serializationStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> that controls type substitution during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"> </xref> que controles de tipo de substituição durante a serialização e desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting> to generate <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> instances for <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> objects.
trans-unit.target: Usado por <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>para gerar <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>instâncias <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>objetos.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SurrogateSelector"></xref> used with this <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"></xref> into which the SOAP top object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"> </xref> no qual o objeto superior SOAP é desserializado.

trans-unit.source: This property is used for SOAP remote procedure call (RPC) format and specifies that the SOAP top record is a method called remotely, not a common language runtime object type.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada para o formato de chamada (RPC) de procedimento remoto de SOAP e especifica que o registro inicial do SOAP é um método chamado remotamente, não um tipo common language runtime objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"></xref> into which the SOAP top object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.ISoapMessage"> </xref> no qual o objeto superior SOAP é desserializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format in which type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o formato no qual as descrições de tipo são apresentadas no fluxo serializado.

trans-unit.source: The format in which type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: O formato no qual tipo descrições são dispostas no fluxo serializado.
